events.title: Up-Helly-Aa Fire Festival
events.description: A Viking-inspired fire festival featuring a torchlit procession and the burning of a replica longship.

events.title: Standard Chartered Hong Kong Marathon
events.description: Today, the Standard Chartered Hong Kong Marathon brings thousands of runners and spectators to the streets of Hong Kong, with events in marathon, half-marathon, 10 km, and wheelchair categories.
